Conclusion : Surgical margin status significant predictor for recurrence .Based on 3 randomized trials ( NSABP B-17 , EORTC 10853 , and UKCCCR ) , all subgroups ( as analyzed by multivariate analysis looking at individual variables ) benefit from RT .

A Singaporean trial used the INT 0099 regimen , and again demonstrated a survival benefit .Concurrent chemo - RT is now considered a standard of care in Stage III - IV NPC ; given previously different staging , some IIB patients were included in the trials and may benefit from concurrent chemotherapy as well .
